version_description: - Performance Enhancements.
Performance Enhancements

We have launched our new Social Banking feature, offering banking service via Twitter.

You will be able to perform transactions such as balance enquiry and view last five transactions with a simple tweet.

To maintain privacy and confidentiality, the bank will only respond to customer queries via a direct message.

Simply register your Twitter account via Emirates Islamic Mobile App to take advantage of this new exciting service.

You can now enjoy 3 new features in Emirates Islamic Mobile APP.

- Smart Touch: login securely to our App with just your fingerprint.
- Scan To Pay: Pay your DEWA bill instantly by scanning the QR code.
- iBeacons: get real-time deals everywhere you go simply by activating iBeacons on your mobile phone.

Let us know your feedback by sending us a message using the “Feedback” option under “Contacts” icon on the App.
- Performance improvements.
- Minor Enhancements.
Minor Enhancements.

CRITICAL UPDATE – As part of our efforts to provide you with an enhanced banking experience, we have updated the app. To continue using Emirates Islamic Mobile Banking, you have to update the latest version of the app, failing which you will not be able to log in.

تحديث هام ـ في إطار استثمارنا المتواصل لتعزيز مستوى الخدمة، لقد قمنا بتحديث التطبيق. لمواصلة الاستفادة من خدمات تطبيق الإمارات الإسلامي للهاتف المتحرك، يرجى تحديث التطبيق وتحميل النسخة الجديدة. وفي حال عدم القيام بتحديث التطبيق لن تتمكن من تسجيل الدخول.

CRITICAL UPDATE – As part of our efforts to provide you with an enhanced banking experience, we have updated the app. To continue using Emirates Islamic Mobile Banking, you have to update the latest version of the app, failing which you will not be able to log in.

تحديث هام ـ في إطار استثمارنا المتواصل لتعزيز مستوى الخدمة، لقد قمنا بتحديث التطبيق. لمواصلة الاستفادة من خدمات تطبيق الإمارات الإسلامي للهاتف المتحرك، يرجى تحديث التطبيق وتحميل النسخة الجديدة. وفي حال عدم القيام بتحديث التطبيق لن تتمكن من تسجيل الدخول.
Bug fixes and improvements
Minor enhancement

- New services added including your nearest branch & the option of getting a queuing ticket at any Branch, with the expected queue time.
- Bug fixes & improvements.

- تمت إضافة خدمات جديدة تتضمن تحديد موقع أقرب فرع إليك وإمكانية الحصول على رقم انتظار في أي فرع تقوم باختياره، مع معرفة وقت الانتظار المتوقع لخدمتك.
- تحسين الأداء.

At Emirates Islamic, we are always innovating to improve our customer's banking experience with us. We have thus powered our Mobile Banking App not only with a new design but a range of new features, including:

- Enhanced Experience: Portfolio view on a user-friendly interface with graphs, charts and pointers.
- Sub Account Opening: Users can easily open a new Current account, Savings account or Investment Term Deposit.
- QuickRemit to India: Users can enjoy money transfers to India in 60 seconds with QuickRemit.
- Additional Card Services:
o Cash on Call –Users can transfer up to 80% of their Card's available limit to their bank account with Cash on Call facility.
o Cards Management –Users can have complete control of their Card at all times, including Block, Activate and Unblock anytime, anywhere.

Thank you for sharing your feedback with Emirates Islamic. We constantly work on enhancing our mobile application to meet your needs and address your observations.

We have taken your comments into consideration, and with this update we have:

- Addressed the Etisalat payment limitation.
- Applied some performance enhancements.
- Addressed the interruption of Authentication code delivery via SMS.
- Swipe the beneficiary name to modify its details.
- Optimized the application for iOS 11 compatibility.

We are always listening to your feedback and we value your suggestions and input. You are always welcome to communicate with us using the Review section.

Thank you for choosing Emirates Islamic.

- Fixed an issue on International Transfers to India.
- Performance Improvement & crash fixes.
- Whenever we release an updated app, you will get a notification upon opening EI Mobile.

We are always listening to your feedback and we value your suggestions and input. You are always welcome to communicate with us using the Review section.

Thank you for choosing Emirates Islamic.

We frequently update our mobile application to deliver a number of improvements and stability fixes that you have reported to us.

Thank you for banking with Emirates Islamic and we appreciate your comments and feedback.

To serve you better, we frequently update our Mobile App to deliver improvements and bring you a better banking experience.

We appreciate your comments and feedback on our Mobile App and services.

Thank you for banking with Emirates Islamic.

لخدمتك بشكل أفضل، نقوم دوماً بتحديث تطبيق الهاتف المتحرك الخاص بنا بهدف تحسين وتطوير تجربتك المصرفية معنا.

ولهذا فنحن نقدّر كثيراً تزويدنا برأيك وملاحظاتك على التطبيق ومستوى خدماتنا بشكل عام.

شكراً لاختيارك التعامل المصرفي مع الإمارات الإسلامي.

To serve you better, we frequently update our Mobile App to deliver improvements and bring you a better banking experience.

We appreciate your comments and feedback on our Mobile App and services.

Thank you for banking with Emirates Islamic.

لخدمتك بشكل أفضل، نقوم دوماً بتحديث تطبيق الهاتف المتحرك الخاص بنا بهدف تحسين وتطوير تجربتك المصرفية معنا.

ولهذا فنحن نقدّر كثيراً تزويدنا برأيك وملاحظاتك على التطبيق ومستوى خدماتنا بشكل عام.

شكراً لاختيارك التعامل المصرفي مع الإمارات الإسلامي.

Authorizing your transactions just got safer and convenient with “Smart Pass”.
Our new service brings a better experience in instantly authorizing digital banking transactions via soft token without the hassle of waiting for the SMS Authentication Code.

Furthermore, to increase your banking experience on our Mobile App, Smart Pass gives you the options to authorize transaction using your Touch ID \Face ID.
Also, not only does our app looks superb on iPhone X, but we also support logging into the app via Face ID.

We appreciate your comments and feedback on our Mobile App and services.
Thank you for banking with Emirates Islamic.

- Card Settings are now available under Credit Card Summary.
- Bills Portfolio has been updated so you can specify the payment amount for each bill separately.
- "Whats New" feature is now available where you will be notified of any new feature after login.
- "App Demo" feature is now available which allows you to view the App offline.
- You can easily view future payments in Calendar under Dashboard.

- Option to choose "Pay All" or "Pay Minimum" for your EI credit cards is now available in the app.
- Enhancements and bug fixes based on customer feedback.

We are pleased to inform you of two important updates on the Emirates Islamic App:

1. You can instantly open your Booster Wakala Deposits & enjoy higher profit rates on your deposits.
2. Redeem your Credit Card rewards with a few taps.

Additionally, we have addressed a few concerns that you have highlighted to us. We’ve also introduced some performance enhancements.

We appreciate your feedback and comments on our Mobile App and services to bring you a better banking experience.

Thank you for banking with Emirates Islamic.

We frequently update our mobile application to deliver a number of improvements and stability fixes that you have reported to us.

Thank you for banking with Emirates Islamic and we appreciate your comments and feedback.

As part of our routine security updates, we have upgraded our Mobile Banking App. To avoid inconvenience, please update your App before 7 September 2018. Starting 8 September 2018, the old App versions will stop working.

We are pleased to introduce four new updates on the Emirates Islamic Mobile App:
 
-          The App now supports Apple Pay. Add your Card to Apple Pay with a few taps!
-          New profile section is now available to check your personal details easily
-          Manage your subscriptions to SMS and e-Statement services
-          Apply easily for an e-Savings Account
 
Please share your feedback and comments and rate our Mobile App.
 
Thank you for banking with Emirates Islamic.

· Now you can use the Emirates Islamic Mobile App to withdraw cash from our ATMs through Cardless Withdrawal. No Debit Card required!
· The App now supports the following Noqodi payments:
o Wallet Top up
o Voucher Payment
· “App Demo” has been updated to show new flows such as profile, statement search and transfers (within EI, between EI and ENBD)
· Contact details of Priority Banking Relationship Manager are now available
· New enhancements based on your valuable feedback

To serve you better, we frequently update our Mobile App to deliver improvements and bring you a better banking experience.

We appreciate your comments and feedback on our Mobile App and services.

Thank you for banking with Emirates Islamic.

· Contact our customer service with the new Secure Mail feature
· Manage your transaction limits more easily
· Your EI cards now appear automatically under card payments
· New enhancements based on your valuable feedback

Please share your feedback and comments and rate our Mobile App.

Thank you for banking with Emirates Islamic.

· Golden touch! We’re pleased to announce the release of the gold theme for our Mobile App, exclusively for our Priority Banking customers
· A new payment option - you can now make payments to Punitive and Correctional Establishments
· For your convenience, we have introduced Account & Credit Card nicknames
· Update your personal details by simply tapping on “Update KYC details” button prior to login
· Enhancements based on your valuable feedback
In this new version of the app you will find enhancements and fixes based on your valuable feedback. Thank you for banking with us.

With this update we have enhanced our Smart Pass service for a more secure and better experience. No more SMS codes needed to authorize your transactions, just a four digit pin from your choice. Try it now in your EI app!
